node.address: Cra 18 # 25-15, Barrio manga esquina , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
We are located at Manga Neighborhood the best area of the city. We are at 5 minutes walking from the Historic Center(Old City). There is a beautiful bay one block away of our place, Bocagrande beach is at 30 minutes walking 10 minutes by bus and 3 minutes by car. The San felipe Castle and the Old shoes monument are at 10 minutes walking. Barú island (Playa blanca) is at 1 hour by bus, car or boat. We have everything that you could need in the same street like Subway and other restaurants, five different banks, 24 hours suppermarket, 24 hours drugstore and more.

Set in Cartagena de Indias, 1.9 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Quintas de la Real by Maos offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a garden. The property is around 3.1 km from Cartagena's Walls, 3.6 km from Bolivar Park and 3.6 km from Cartagena's Gold Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.
Guests at the hostel can enjoy an American breakfast.

Palace of the Inquisition is 3.6 km from Quintas de la Real by Maos, while Steps of La Popa Mount is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.
Manga is a great choice for travellers interested in islands, nightlife and city walks.

description.description: The building is a big three floor house on a corner of the best Neighborhood of Cartagena at 5 minutes walking from the historic center. The place has 7 rooms, two private with double bed and private bathroom, two private room with double bed and shared bathroom, One(1) mix dorm for four(4) people with Shared bathroom , One(1) mix dorm for 6 people and one(1) mix dorm for 8 people. An equipped kitchen, and a chill out area. All the rooms have air conditioning.
